event.title: beach resorts
event.description: to escape from daily life pressure and to stay in a nature friendly atmosphere is every one wish today, in cities , air and environment is highly polluted , so everyone need a change and choose nature friendly tourist places , that is why eco tourism is more popular now, like that beaches like marari beach and beach resorts are also popular among people, the climate, foods , service offered by the resorts will attract everybody to resorts, we are also initiate to go back to nature, you can enjoy the aroma of fresh air in beach resort in alleppey , ayurveda, mediation, yoga etc are we offer, you can either select rooms, or private cottages, which will provide all facilities like best hotels but keep a tradition always.
